meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>ridicule</kanji> everyone but your<kanji>self</kanji> because you have so much <vocabulary>pride</vocabulary>. When you talk about yourself you only <vocabulary>boast</vocabulary> because there's nothing to ridicule. That's how great you think you are.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
